name: Maintenance Chaos
description:
Maintenance Chaos

a game for the Shenanijam 2019 for the theme "Cursemas Ever" and parts of the other themes ("Chaos" and "Wrenches")

You are a worker at the toy factory for Santa Claus.

Christmas is only one week away, but suddently more and more machines are starting to break.

You hear some other workers talking about the machines being cursed.

How to Play

Play the tutorial.

Use a Gamepad if you have one. (But you have to use the mouse in the menus)

Download the game for better performance.
